title: "Bad Vegan" Sarma Melngailis Tells All!
itunes:title: "Bad Vegan" Sarma Melngailis Tells All!
description:
BAD VEGAN... Everyone is talking about it. It's one of the hottest shows on Netflix and there are so many unanswered questions. Well Sarma herself (and Leon!) is here for an epic two-hour tell-all. Everything you ever wanted to know plus a few genuine surprises. Grab some tofu and quinoa, we're diving in! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
